attributes.action: Stop the planned closure of Savernake Hospital Minor Induries Unit and the Mental Health Unit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the planned closure of Savernake Hospital Minor Induries Unit and the Mental Health Unit.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the planned closure of Savernake Hospital Minor Induries Unit and the Mental Health Unit."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13307.asp

Prime Minister's Office
